title: Theoretical point of view on Cabibbo angle anomaly
abstract:
We present the current situation of the determinations of the first-row CKM
components and show the Cabibbo angle anomaly corresponding to a deficit in the
first-row CKM unitarity condition at the $3\sigma$ level. In this contribution,
we show two new physics interpretations: heavy vector-like quark models and a
MeV scale sterile neutrino models. The super tau-charm facility will directly
probe the other CKM unitarity conditions related to $V_{cd}$.
